item.title: Jigoku Sensei Nube (2025) Reveals Premiere Date, Trailer, and New Theme Songs
item.description: The ‘Jigoku Sensei Nube’ reboot is set to premiere on July 2, 2025, on TV Asahi with a one-hour special. The latest trailer showcases modern designs, new theme songs, and Ryotaro Okiayu returning as Nube.

item.title: Gachiakuta Announces Global Premiere Screenings, Theme Songs, and New Characters Ahead of July 6 Debut
item.description: The Gachiakuta anime is set to premiere on July 6, 2025. The main PV, theme songs by Paledusk and DUSTCELL, and global screenings in 15 countries have been announced.

item.title: Dandadan Season 2 to Air on July 3, 2025 with New Trailer and Official Theme Songs
item.description: The anime Dandadan has announced Season 2 will air starting July 3, 2025. The new trailer showcases intense action, absurd humor, and official theme songs by Aina the End and WurtS.
